items.title: Are Finance Stocks Lagging  Ares Capital (ARCC) This Year?
items.description: Here is how Ares Capital (ARCC) and American Express (AXP) have performed compared to their sector so far this year.

items.title: Robinhood will let you bet on Super Bowl LIX between the Kansas City Chiefs and Philadelphia Eagles
items.description: Robinhood dabbles in sports betting for the first time.

items.title: 2 Best Warren Buffett Stocks to Buy in February
items.description: Warren Buffett has gained the reputation of a buy-and-hold investor, but he has bought and sold many stocks over the years as CEO of Berkshire Hathaway.  In 2024, for instance, he pulled a lot of money out of stocks Berkshire owned.  Through the third quarter, Berkshire had sold $133 billion worth, including a majority of its Apple position.

items.title: Should You Buy This Unstoppable Warren Buffett Stock With $1,000 Right Now?
items.description: Berkshire Hathaway has compounded investor capital at a nearly 20% annual rate for decades.  One of Warren Buffett's top positions is in this unstoppable financial stock that has soared 123% in the past 15 months.  Berkshire Hathaway owns 21.5% of the outstanding shares of American Express (NYSE: AXP).

items.title: These 3 Dow Stocks Are Set to Soar in 2025 and Beyond
items.description: The Dow Jones Industrial Average (DJINDICES: ^DJI) roared higher last year, gaining more than 12%, as some of its biggest growth companies advanced.  Thanks to this ongoing momentum, 2025 may be another good one for the Dow Jones, and three stocks in particular might lead the gains.  Nvidia (NASDAQ: NVDA) joined the Dow Jones last year and went on to post the top performance in the index for the year -- the stock surged 171%.
